scripts.dev: sh -c "(cd server && npm run dev) & (cd frontend && npm run dev) & wait"
scripts.build: sh -c "cd server && npm run build && cd ../frontend && npm run build && mkdir -p ../server/dist/public && rm -rf ../server/dist/public/* && cp -r dist/* ../server/dist/public/"
scripts.lint: sh -c "cd server && npm run lint && cd ../frontend && npm run lint"
